name: Wonderware Mobile Solutions
overview: Wonderware Mobile Solutions Group provides integrated field force automation software and solutions for process manufacturing industries. It offers IntelaTrac Mobile Workforce and Decision Support System, an enterprise software solution that provides asset tracking, data collection, and integration solutions. The company also provides RFID, wireless LAN, handheld computers, and peripherals. It offers the IntelaTrac Refining and Chemical product line that provides software architecture and mobile computing infrastructure to manage field data collection, remote work activities and processes, asset tracking, alarms and corrective actions for abnormal operating conditions, and knowledge capture; and the IntelaTrac Power suite to manage field data collection, field force dispatch and monitoring, asset tracking, alarms and corrective actions for abnormal operating conditions, knowledge capture, and integration capabilities with enterprise manufacturing decision support systems. The company also provides the IntelaTrac Pharmaceutical suite that provides software architecture and mobile computing infrastructure to manage field data collection, process change with signature control, asset tracking, knowledge capture, and integration capabilities with enterprise resource planning systems; and the IntelaTrac Food and Beverage suite to manage field data collection, process log data, asset tracking, knowledge capture, and integration capabilities with process historians and enterprise resource planning systems. The company was formerly known as SAT Corporation and changed its name to Wonderware Mobile Solutions Group in 2008. The company was founded in 1995 and based in Houston, Texas. As of August 20, 2008, Wonderware Mobile Solutions Group operates as a subsidiary of Wonderware Corporation.
